attributes.action: Increase spending on the NHS by increasing tax.
attributes.additional_details:
A completely free first class NHS service must be considered as a number one priority for the UK Government.
The NHS should be cross party managed by experts elected from the medical profession,MPs, Industry advisors etc.
Any form of privatisation shall be avoided.
A cross party white paper will be presented by the government outlining in detail the planning and the detailed new approach towards how we are going to plan,fund,manage and execute the U.K s new vision and approach to our NHS.
attributes.background:
The NHS is in financial difficulties as declared by most medical experts. Ring fence the extra tax.
Government policy with regards to monetary cuts is cited as being damaging.
An increasing population is stated as a reason for failing standards,the answer is to increase the spending on the NHS.

rejection.details:
These petitions are similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/167190
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178125
